tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskIndicators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_name TEXT,
    current_value FLOAT,
    target_value FLOAT,
    status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE senior_management_dashboard (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	dashboard_name VARCHAR(255),
	key_risk_indicator VARCHAR(255),
	current_value DECIMAL,
	target_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	dashboard_id INT,
	display_order INT,
	FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES senior_management_dashboard(id),
	FOREIGN KEY(dashboard_id) REFERENCES senior_management_dashboard(id)
);

CREATE TABLE dashboard_settings (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	dashboard_id INT,
	refresh_interval INT,
	display_theme VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY(dashboard_id) REFERENCES senior_management_dashboard(id)
);

CREATE TABLE notification_history (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	dashboard_id INT,
	notification_text TEXT,
	notification_sent_at TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY(dashboard_id) REFERENCES senior_management_dashboard(id)
);
